item.title: My favorite books of all time
item.description:
I love to read. Like, LOVE to read. As such, there are some books I loved and some books I hated. So here is my rundown of all my favorite books!

But before we begin, I’d like to thank our sponsor, my YouTube channel! shameless plug I post Minecraft a few times every week. I’m trying to hit 100 subscribers by 2022, so it would mean a lot if you subscribed! Click here to subscribe.
